channel.title: Re: Jagexlike - single player offline server?
channel.description:
[quote="naseem142, post:4, topic:541170"][quote author=TryingIt link=topic=660039.msg4413414#msg4413414 date=1394739282] [quote author=Pure_ link=topic=660039.msg4413401#msg4413401 date=1394734377] Find a server, download it and play it. Nothing will be a full-scale emulation though. [/quote]
I already did. My question was (in a nutshell):
What is the most Jagexlike server out there, especially with single player in mind? [/quote]
You can find a lot in the [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,221.0.html]Server advertisements[/url] section , But the best ones i know are:
[url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,543137.0.html]Rune Rebels[/url] Or [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,657760.0.html]06Prime - 2006 Remake[/url][/quote]
Those are Clients (and the server is online). I was looking for a server emu in order to play offline, on my pc.

item.title: Re: Jagexlike - single player offline server?
item.dc:creator: @TryingIt TryingIt
item.description:
@TryingIt wrote:

[quote=“naseem142, post:4, topic:541170”][quote author=TryingIt link=topic=660039.msg4413414#msg4413414 date=1394739282]

Find a server, download it and play it. Nothing will be a full-scale emulation though.

I already did.
My question was (in a nutshell):

What is the most Jagexlike server out there, especially with single player in mind?
[/quote]

You can find a lot in the Server advertisements section , But the best ones i know are:

Rune Rebels
Or
06Prime - 2006 Remake[/quote]

Those are Clients (and the server is online).
I was looking for a server emu in order to play offline, on my pc.
